CustomField.formula: Name +' | '+ clofor_com_cfs__Tariff__r.Name +' | '+'Invoice to: '+ clofor_com_cfs__Seikyusaki__r.Name +' | '+ TEXT(clofor_com_cfs__Tariff__r.clofor_com_cfs__SellAmountUSD__c) +' USD | '+ TEXT(clofor_com_cfs__Tariff__r.clofor_com_cfs__SellKingakuJPY__c) +' '+ $Setup.clofor_com_cfs__Site_Custom_Settings__c.clofor_com_cfs__Local_Currency__c+' | '+'Payment to: '+ clofor_com_cfs__PaymentTo__r.Name+ ' | '+ TEXT(clofor_com_cfs__Tariff__r.clofor_com_cfs__BuyAmountUSD__c) +' USD | '+ TEXT(clofor_com_cfs__Tariff__r.clofor_com_cfs__BuyKingaku__c) +' '+ $Setup.clofor_com_cfs__Site_Custom_Settings__c.clofor_com_cfs__Local_Currency__c+' | '+ TEXT(clofor_com_cfs__Suryo__c) +' | '+ clofor_com_cfs__ChargeUnitInPrint__c
CustomField.label: Summary of Billings
